languages.text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.
languages.original_text: Первая за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} для одиночной цели, примененная союзником к архмилитанту, дает этому союзнику +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очко действия{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Every round, the first single-target ability used by an ally on the Veteran grants +1 action point to that ally.
Every round, the first single-target ability used by an ally on the Veteran grants +1 action point to that ally.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当盟友首次对首席战士使用单体{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}后，该盟友额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.

traits.locale_text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当盟友首次对首席战士使用单体{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}后，该盟友额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, la primera {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de un solo objetivo que un aliado use sobre el Archimilitante proporciona 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} a dicho aliado.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.

traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, la primera {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de un solo objetivo que un aliado use sobre el Archimilitante proporciona 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} a dicho aliado.

languages.text: 毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}、味方がアーク・ミリタントに対して単体{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を最初に使用すると、その味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}が+1付与される。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.

traits.locale_text: 毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}、味方が古参（ベテラン）に対して単体{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を最初に使用すると、その味方にアクションポイントが+1付与される。

languages.text: Первая за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} для одиночной цели, примененная союзником к архмилитанту, дает этому союзнику +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очко действия{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.

traits.locale_text: Первая за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} для одиночной цели, примененная союзником к ветерану, дает этому союзнику +1 очко действия.
Первая за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} для одиночной цели, примененная союзником к ветерану, дает этому союзнику +1 очко действия.

languages.text: Für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} gilt: Die erste Einzelziel-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, die von einem Verbündeten auf den Erzmilitanten angewendet wird, gewährt diesem Verbündeten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkt{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.

traits.locale_text: Für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} gilt: Die erste Einzelziel-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, die von einem Verbündeten auf den Erzmilitanten angewendet wird, gewährt diesem Verbündeten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkt{/g}.

languages.text: Lors de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, la première {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} à cible unique utilisée par un allié sur l'archimilitant confère +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g} à cet allié.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.

traits.locale_text: Lors de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, la première {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} à cible unique utilisée par un allié sur le Vétéran confère +1 point d'action à cet allié.

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} bir dost birimin Başmilitan üzerinde kullandığı ilk tek hedefli {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, o dost birime +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} kazandırır.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.
